LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_RawRice.label: Make Straw rice bag(rice)
LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_RawRice.description: 300 rice can be stored, and it can be sold as agricultural products./n CAUTION: Because the airtightness is bad, the contents decrease when opening.
